name: My Master Only Breaks Through Every Time the Limit Is Reached
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeUnknown
content: In a Ancient strange world, an amusing system, cultivation of immortals! “Master, this disciple is incompetent, it is my fault that you could not breakthrough before you die” “relax, i, your master will not die.” “This disciple was useless, I’m unable to obtain a few foundation pills for master, otherwise… “ the genius of the sect fell to the ground kneeling while crying. Xu Fan looked at the eldest disciple helplessly, as he takes out a foundation pill and toss it in his mouth. In a split secon
